name: Ring of Yaxche
description: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.
descriptionRaw: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.
effectTemplateRaw: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by <color=#99FFFFFF>{0}</color> for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of <color=#99FFFFFF>{1}</color>.

r1.description: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by 0.6% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of 16%.

r2.description: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by 0.7% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of 20%.

r3.description: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by 0.8% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of 24%.

r4.description: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by 0.9% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of 28%.

r5.description: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by 1% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of 32%.
